name: Library Of SunWeld
description:
NOTE: this game is not supposed to be a horror game, but if you get scared very easily, you might want to not play this.

A small game made for Godot Wild Jam 27. 

They did not understand your reasons for setting fire to the library, so you escaped into the library itself, which mysteriously, was not affected much by the fire. But you can't stay inside forever, can you?

Controls:

WASD for moving

Left and right arrow keys for rotating 

Space to interact with levers or ladders

I recommend downloading the EXE file instead of playing on browser, it is smaller than the HTML file.

Cave ambience music from ZapSplat

Color Palette: Kirokaze Gameboy

Talking noises from here , made by @Shades
